Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Hand = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso local vPlayer local myRightArm
local otherHumanoid
Tool.Enabled = true
local highFiveAnim local otherHighFiveAnim
local AOE = Vector3.new(5, 5, 5)
local clapSound
local sg local frame local genericTextLabel
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local parts = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(myTorso.Position - AOE, myTorso.Position + AOE), vCharacter, 100) for i = 1, #parts do if parts[i] and parts[i].Parent then local humanoid = parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then otherHumanoid = humanoid break end end end
if otherHumanoid then local otherTorso = otherHumanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if otherTorso and myRightArm then otherTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(myRightArm.Position + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 3, myRightArm.Position) end highFiveAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.HighFiveAnim) otherFiveAnim = otherHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.OtherFiveAnim) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 otherHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 if highFiveAnim then highFiveAnim:Play() end if game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(otherHumanoid.Parent) then local animScript = Tool.AnimateScript:Clone() animScript.Parent = otherHumanoid.Parent animScript.Disabled = false else print("Playing other anim") if otherFiveAnim then otherFiveAnim:Play() end end
local duration = 0.95 local clapSound = Hand:FindFirstChild("ClapSound") if clapSound then clapSound:Play() end while duration > 0 do if duration > 0.6 then otherTorso.CFrame = (otherTorso.CFrame + otherTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 0.06) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi/90, 0) else otherTorso.CFrame = (otherTorso.CFrame + otherTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 0.06) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi/15, 0) end duration = duration - wait() wait() end myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 otherHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end
wait(2.0) otherHumanoid = nil Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myRightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm")
vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer then local playerGui = vPlayer:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if playerGui and playerGui:FindFirstChild("HighFiveGui") == nil then sg = Instance.new("ScreenGui") sg.Name = "HighFiveGui" sg.Parent = playerGui
frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Parent = sg frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 270, 0, 30) frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -135, 1, -130) frame.Style = Enum.FrameStyle.RobloxRound
genericTextLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel") genericTextLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 genericTextLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) genericTextLabel.Visible = true genericTextLabel.ZIndex = 10 genericTextLabel.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size10 genericTextLabel.Font = Enum.Font.Legacy genericTextLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 127/255, 0) genericTextLabel.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Center genericTextLabel.TextYAlignment = Enum.TextYAlignment.Top genericTextLabel.Parent = frame genericTextLabel.Text = "Get close to your friends and active the hand!" end end end
function onUnequipped() if highFiveAnim then highFiveAnim:Stop() end if otherHighFiveAnim then otherHighFiveAnim:Stop() end if otherHumanoid and otherHumanoid.WalkSpeed == 0.0 then otherHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 otherHumanoid = nil end if clapSound then clapSound:Stop() end if sg then sg:Destroy() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

while script:FindFirstChild("OtherFiveAnim") == nil do wait() end
local character = script.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if humanoid then fiveAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(script.OtherFiveAnim) if fiveAnim then fiveAnim:Play() end end
wait(1.5) if fiveAnim then fiveAnim:Stop() end script:Remove()
